name: Memory To Old Ones - Ludum Dare 43
name_original: Memory To Old Ones - Ludum Dare 43
description:
Hey! Welcome to the new world of freedom!

In this world, you can do anything, can be any career you want to be! Here, you are god, and all things obey your order!

And all you need is just a little bit of memory, and a sincere heart to play games!

* a new gaming experience

* rich game content

* endless DLC

* highly interactive

* complicated details

* surreal encounters and events

* real love systems

Memory to Old Ones, waiting for your playing!

-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --

This was an introduction to an old game.

Interesting, right?

But what about NPCS who live in games and have been neglected for a long time?

Do they still believe in their god and follow the ideal path of life?

... Who knows.

And...

Who cares?

Until the time when they experienced it.
